name: Tattoo Studio Manager Free
short_description: Do you need software to help you manage your tattoo studio effectively? Do you absolutely hate it when your software stops working and requires that you pay for a yearly "update"? Then Tattoo Studio Manager Free is the software for you. While it doesn't have all the extraneous bells and whistles as other commercial software packages,  Tattoo Studio Manager Free will help you keep track of client records, day to day expenses, studio supplies, artist payouts, and many other important aspects of running a successful tattoo studio.
summary: A free PHP MySQL based project to manage your tattoo studio.
